com.skocur.imagecipher.tools.imageprocessing

Class ColorFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.skocur.imagecipher.tools.imageprocessing.ColorFilter

  • public class ColorFilter
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that is responsible for processing data from image. This specific one gets color from every pixel from image and after this process this filtered data can be saved or returned to GUI in order to be displayed.

    • Constructor Summary

      ColorFilter()

    • Method Detail

      • getColorOf

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage getColorOf(java.io.File file,
                                                      int option)
                                               throws java.io.IOException
        Returns BufferedImage object that is in one color. Takes option parameter which describes color value of filtering: 1 - Red (default) 2 - Green 3 - Blue Method goes through whole image changing every pixel it meets to chosen color. This filtering option influences bitwise operation, which is used to fetch specific color from pixel.
        Parameters:
        file - Image that will be processed
        option - Mode of color filtering
        Returns:
        Buffered Image - Processed Image
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown when file cannot be found

      • getColorAndSave

        public static void getColorAndSave(java.io.File file,
                                   int option)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Method that filter color from image. Option of filtering is based on option fetched from command line argument. Default filter is to RED.
        Parameters:
        file - Path to image
        option - Option of filtering
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
